ing: 1 (8 ounce) package reduced-fat cream cheese, softened
1/2 cup granular sucrolose sweetener (such as SplendaÂ®), or more to taste
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "Great frosting even if you are not on a sugar-free diet!"
ins: Beat cream cheese and sucralose sweetener together in a bowl using an electric mixer until smooth and creamy; stir in whipped topping and vanilla extract until smooth.
